nodes.bodyText: You don't need to add all these keys in each language. Just add them in the base properties file.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -7,7 +7,10 @@ add_q=Frage hinzuf\u00fcgen\: addr=Adressen\: admin=Admin done=Fertig -ass_preview=Pr\u00fcfungsvorschau - Beispieldarstellung, wie Studierenden diese Pr\u00fcfung angezeigt wird +exit_preview=Exit Preview +ass_preview_1=Assessment Preview - This preview provides an approximate view of the layout of the assessment for students. +ass_preview_2= The preview will not allow you to save or submit answers, display the timer if there is a time limit, or access any feedback. +ass_preview_3= The preview also does not take into account students' ability (or lack thereof) to view images or other media embedded in questions.

nodes.bodyText: You don't actually need to put these strings into 3 properties. You can do multiline properties in Java, just use a backslash at the end of each line, just for readability. That way the whole thing is loaded up into one element during the faces render. So, I'd just update ass_preview with whole suggested text, with those backslashes on the end of the lines.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -7,7 +7,10 @@ add_q=Add Question: addr=Addresses: admin=Admin done=done -ass_preview=Assessment Preview - This is an example student view of this assessment +exit_preview=Exit Preview +ass_preview_1=Assessment Preview - This preview provides an approximate view of the layout of the assessment for students. +ass_preview_2= The preview will not allow you to save or submit answers, display the timer if there is a time limit, or access any feedback. +ass_preview_3= The preview also does not take into account students' ability (or lack thereof) to view images or other media embedded in questions.

@@ -7,7 +7,10 @@ add_q=Add Question: addr=Addresses: admin=Admin done=done -ass_preview=Assessment Preview - This is an example student view of this assessment +exit_preview=Exit Preview +ass_preview_1=Assessment Preview - This preview provides an approximate view of the layout of the assessment for students. +ass_preview_2= The preview will not allow you to save or submit answers, display the timer if there is a time limit, or access any feedback. +ass_preview_3= The preview also does not take into account students' ability (or lack thereof) to view images or other media embedded in questions.

nodes.bodyText: Are the slashes needed at the beginning of each sentence? In your screenshots on the Jira issue, the sentences are missing a single space in between period and the start of the next sentence.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -7,7 +7,8 @@ add_q=Add Question: addr=Addresses: admin=Admin done=done -ass_preview=Assessment Preview - This is an example student view of this assessment +exit_preview=Exit Preview +ass_preview=Assessment Preview - This preview provides an approximate view of the layout of the assessment for students. \The preview will not allow you to save or submit answers, display the timer if there is a time limit, or access any feedback. \The preview also does not take into account students' ability (or lack thereof) to view images or other media embedded in questions.

nodes.bodyText:
In first place, thank you for your comments.
It was only for readability, given that there was three sentences in a row.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -7,7 +7,8 @@ add_q=Add Question: addr=Addresses: admin=Admin done=done -ass_preview=Assessment Preview - This is an example student view of this assessment +exit_preview=Exit Preview +ass_preview=Assessment Preview - This preview provides an approximate view of the layout of the assessment for students. \The preview will not allow you to save or submit answers, display the timer if there is a time limit, or access any feedback. \The preview also does not take into account students' ability (or lack thereof) to view images or other media embedded in questions.

nodes.bodyText: I suggest we modify the last sentence to: The preview does not reflect whether students can access or view images or other media embedded in questions.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -7,7 +7,8 @@ add_q=Add Question: addr=Addresses: admin=Admin done=done -ass_preview=Assessment Preview - This is an example student view of this assessment +exit_preview=Exit Preview +ass_preview=Assessment Preview - This preview provides an approximate view of the layout of the assessment for students. \The preview will not allow you to save or submit answers, display the timer if there is a time limit, or access any feedback. \The preview also does not take into account students' ability (or lack thereof) to view images or other media embedded in questions.

nodes.bodyText:
Done!
Thank you for your comment.
I've uploaded the changes.
And added a new image to the jira ticket.
@fostersdesign
